ComicInfo.Title: Peril on Planet Zero; The History of Flight, Number 15: The New World of Space; Sightings in the Sky; The History of Flight, Number 11: People and Planes
ComicInfo.Summary:
Peril on Planet Zero: The Robinsons reestablish contact with Earth, but while they explore an alien planet an evil scientist captures the children, using his army of ice creatures. He subjects them to mind control and uses them to kidnap a scientist on a rival planet. Craig captures the mind control device and frees the children, who release the scientist. Krangak and his ice creatures are killed in the ensuing struggle.
The History of Flight, Number 15: The New World of Space: Description of satellites and Earth orbiters, present and planned
Sightings in the Sky: Descriptions of Unidentified Flying Objects, as reported by various witnesses.
The History of Flight, Number 11: People and Planes: Four famous long-distance flights
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 18:16:00. [CVDB6547] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:42:19. [Issue ID 17719]
